title: Be a Peacemaker
itunes:title: Be a Peacemaker
description:
Peace is a gift from God to us, but we have to do our part to maintain and develop it. When you choose to be a peacemaker, you’re choosing to walk in the fullness of God’s blessing.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
